website_summaries.verdict: The best choice for any indoor cat, featuring a grain-free recipe made to keep your cat nourished, content, and all-around healthy.
pros: Formulated for a healthy maintained weight, heart, immune system, skin, and digestion
Includes nutritious ingredients like peas and potatoes
cons: Some cats developed dander or flakes on their backs

customer_reviews.title: Vet told me to stay away from grain-free foods
customer_reviews.text: I was misled by a lot of information about pet food on the internet. People make it seem like going grain-free is the right thing to do for your pets. After my cat had vomited a few too many times after being on this food, I took him to the vet and they suggested switching to a food that is tested to meet AAFCO standards. My vet discussed with me the high incidence of heart disease in dogs on grain-free diets and how the issues went away after switching off a grain-free diet. Even though the research is still ongoing in cats, why risk it when there are vet and PhD nutritionist approved, formulated, and tested diets for your pets.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this food and he's really picky! ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this food and he's really picky!!! However, he started to develop flakes on his back and I looked into it further. I ended up finding this chart with the minimal needs of nutrients that cats need in their dry food. This food was quite a bit lower than that suggested amount. I buy this food because its healthy for my cat and grain free but it's not worth the price if its not giving my cat everything he needs. I switched to Beyond Grain Free cat food since they reached those suggested amounts of nutrients.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Paul

customer_reviews.title: Anyway - not buying it anymore though the concept is great!
customer_reviews.text: My cats have started throwing up much more since I poured this into their bowl - has something changed? This happened with the last bag, I thought it was just a fluke - obviously not. My daughter said its those darker pieces in the food - her dog gets sick off them as well. Anyway - not buying it anymore though the concept is great!
customer_reviews.author: Auntie Pedantic

customer_reviews.title: This is not right.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this cat food before but this time it looks like mealworms got into it. I'd like to return it but not sure what I should do since it's been opened. This could very well be the reason I'm finding cat vomit around.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer Renee

customer_reviews.title: Our Cat Can't Live Without This Food...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the deal is with some of the negative one-star reviews. Every bag I've ordered from Amazon (probably 5 now) my cat has eaten up every morsel like it's candy. We feed her about a can a day of the gravy lover's wet food, but she really would rather all her meals be this dry food. She just loves it. Maybe a bad batch, stored incorrectly - or something - got sent to the one-star reviewers. I don't know. All I know is that our healthy, glowing coated, frisky cat loves this stuff. Ordering my 6th bag tomorrow...
customer_reviews.author: MrSmartyPants

customer_reviews.title: Gave our male cat urinary crystals, but our female cats love it and had no issues
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love this food and only want to eat it, but it has given our male cat urinary crystals and stones twice now and so we've had to switch after using this for about 4 years. I don't know mineral they put too much of in this, but I really wish we could just keep using it because the limited ingredient formula worked so well for us in every other way. Now I'm having to search through all of the urinary cat food options out there for something that is also grain free to accommodate our cat's food sensitivities.
customer_reviews.author: lonestarkate81

customer_reviews.title: I will never buy this cat food again. Caused ...
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy this cat food again. Caused health issues with all 3 of my cats. Hair loss & dullness. Problems with urinating, irritability. Changed food & all systems went away. Shame on Blue Buffalo!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Eats It!
customer_reviews.text: I was feeding our kitty Nutro Max Cat. But when Nutro stopped making that food, I needed to find a good replacement. I read a lot of reviews of so many cat food brands, but I was taken in by the positive reviews for the Blue Buffalo. At first, kitty just sniffed it and walked away (typical, right?) and I worried that she wouldn't eat it. But a little later she came back and devoured the food. She gets wet food and this Blue Buffalo Freedom Indoor. She has had no stomach upset (yea!), her coat is gorgeous and she likes to eat it. Amazon's price was the best I could find.
customer_reviews.author: honest

customer_reviews.title: Kitty can't eat this
customer_reviews.text: My kitty is 5 years and has been eating this for years. She's now throwing up on this food only.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: It's a win!
customer_reviews.text: We recently switched one of our cats to this food because he was having some issues with his old food. Transition to the new food went well and he seems to be feeling much better with this one. I don't know if it was the grains that were bothering him or if it's just because this is a better quality food but it's working great. It is a little pricey but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Goodrich

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: My cats love. If changing food, I recommend adding this one to the old one until your cat gets used to it rather than completely switching. I have one picky cat and the other doesn’t care. I had to mix it gradually for the picky one and now she won’t stop snacking on this. It’s also grain free so her poop smells a lot less awful than before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same, making cats sick.
customer_reviews.text: After reading a lot of reviews, it confirms for me something is wrong with buying this food through Amazon. My cats used to love it when I bought it from Petco/PetSmart, and now will not eat it, and my one vomited a huge amount yesterday and I just found him sitting in his litter box because he has such bad diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Use to be great not anymore
customer_reviews.text: Amazon says I've purchased this food from them 32 times. I go through a bag a month for my four cats. It used to be good. I brought starving rescues back from the brink, raised foster kittens and my own cats were always fine. Then something changed. Two of my cats lost a lot of weight. They refused to eat it to the point where I took one of them to the vet because her spine was sticking out. The vet told me there was nothing wrong with her. Anyway I switched to Taste of the Wild, which pound for pound is about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Vito

customer_reviews.title: Q.A. needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Normally I love Blue Buffalo. My cat does well on it, very soft, and I let her “graze” during the day. I finally opened the last bag I ordered and was surprised to see that it was all the same color...except for 1 bit. Apparently the LifeSource bits didn’t make it into this bag. After contacting Blue Buffalo, they said I could return it to the store (too late to return to Amazon since the last return date was August 17th) and they said they don’t have coupons for bringing it to Q.A.s attention, but they could send treats. Just hoping this doesn’t become a continual issue.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P.

customer_reviews.title: My older cat has food allergies and has been on ...
customer_reviews.text: My older cat has food allergies and has been on expensive RX food for years. When I brought a younger cat home, I wanted to find a product that would work for both of them without bankrupting me. After trying many, many different top rated foods (as well as researching and buying the most simple foods, most natural foods, etc), this is the one regular cat food I've found that doesn't make my older one throw up.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Generally good, but quality control issues
customer_reviews.text: We've been feeding our cats with the same food for years, and switched to buying it from amazon for the past year. They have been generally happy with it, but our cats would not eat any food from the last two bags we ordered. They are happy with the same food from the local pet store. Unfortunately, saving a couple dollars buying online isn't worth getting a bad bag every once in a while, especially when you can't return.
customer_reviews.author: Opat

customer_reviews.title: 3 finicky cats love it and it's truly Grain-Free
customer_reviews.text: My cats have allergies and need to eat Grain-Free food. This is a favorite of theirs and I have three finicky eaters with two having two - different allergies, this brand satisfies them all. I wish it was less expensive and available in a 20lb bag.
customer_reviews.author: Smart_Savy_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: A great food for healthy cats!
customer_reviews.text: Good price and my cats loved this food. We had to switch to their other limited-ingredient food because my cat had a bad reaction to chicken. I highly recommend this food for cats to have healthy skin and fur if they can handle chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vet says Blue Buffalo is not good for cats.
customer_reviews.text: Had to take my cat to the vet and then for an ultrasound due to excessive vomiting. My cat was immediately recommended a different food brand by the first vet. The vet who did the ultrasound was even more frank- saying that blue buffalo is not good for cats and that feeding has likely contributed to the intestinal swelling seen in my cat’s ultrasound. My cat really enjoyed the taste of this food and seemed to be ok with it for a long time. Turns out it was damaging his body from the inside out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged bag
customer_reviews.text: I would like to start off with saying that this review is not on the product itself. The pictures show that the bag of food was punctured/torn open and then taped shut with amazon tape. How do I trust that this product was not messed with and is safe to feed my cats? I wasted $30 and had to run to a store to buy a new bag that is sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany A

customer_reviews.title: blue buffalo freedom
customer_reviews.text: my cats love this food. i was happy to see it on autoship w/ a coupon. if it stays a decent price i will continue to buy it. i have 2 very healthy cats who have been brought up on this food, they have gorgeous thick coats, one silky. no hairballs!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon R Bradac

customer_reviews.title: I Don't Like The Taste But, The Cats Do
customer_reviews.text: Our two cats eat this stuff better than any previous dry food. Excellent nutrition rating. If only cats could type we'd get an honest end user opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great cat food great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food i have ever given my cat. She is always very shiny (see pic), soft and energetic. I This cost is great and its a huge bag. Not having to trudge to a pet store that is sometimes out of it anyhow is a huge plus. I will purchase on amazon regularly.
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Great food choice!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Blue buffalo for my cats for about 6 years now after my vet recommended it. This food gives me the confidence that my pets are getting all the nutrition they need, and my babies love the taste (especially since I can change up the flavors every now and then). Both of my cats have sensitive stomachs and are fairly picky, but I have never had an issue getting them to eat this. It minimizes hair balls, and their fur looks healthy and feels soft, plus it helps keep them active and lean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only dry food my kitties will eat
customer_reviews.text: My male and female cat (1 and 3 years old) both love this food. My male cat actually prefers this to the wet food. It has not caused any stomach issues or loose stools and my cats seem to enjoy it day after day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cat food
customer_reviews.text: Both my cats switched to this easily. No more stinky loose stools
customer_reviews.author: KELLY

customer_reviews.title: My two cats really like this food
customer_reviews.text: My two cats really like this food. I started with the Blue Buffalo "kitten" version then switched to the "adult" at the appropriate time. They receive no other food. I leave their bowls full all of the time and they eat whenever they want and as much at they want. They are now three years old and the vet says their weight is perfect. Blue Buffalo costs a little more than other cat food, but it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne E Millsap

customer_reviews.title: Our cats love this food
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love this food. We didn't have any trouble transitioning them from their old brand. We made the switch because one of our cats was having some skin issues and a grain-free diet was recommended. After about three months, his skin is MUCH better. I don't know if the food was the magic trick to get him back on track, but since changing their diets, both our cats have softer coats and there is MUCH less fur around our house. Despite the cost, we're going to stick with this food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST FOR A 13 YEAR OLD CAT :)
customer_reviews.text: My cat is 13 years old, the love of my life, and someone I hope to be with me for many more years. With this food, I do not worry about him because of there being no grains, good supplements, and most important that my cat (bob) enjoys it! Bob my cat has had issues with constipation and when I say the good fiber intake and moisture content with this I had to try it and to my success my cat is very much happy as we all would be in the same situation! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Si si

customer_reviews.title: Did they change the formula of the "life source bits"??
customer_reviews.text: Used to love this cat food but they must have changed the formula of their "life source bits" because now my cat will no longer eat them! She used to eat them no problem but now she spits them out and eats the other kibbles only! So I will be switching to a different brand because all of their food has the life source bits unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Tafadzwa Bwititi

customer_reviews.title: my cat gives this a thumbs down
customer_reviews.text: Though my cat is not fond of this, I understand it is heavy with things that are good for him so I give him a mix of it with his regular Purina food. I will do this until it is gone and then he is home free with his favorite only after that!
customer_reviews.author: Carole Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Vomiting and Blood in stool.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. Do NOT feed this to your pets. Within less than a week my cat started vomiting and there was bloody stools. If I could give it less than one star, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Fussy Cat
customer_reviews.text: I have a fussy 9 year old cat that has eaten the same food for 8.5 years. My vet said I should switch to something healthier, and I knew I should, so I went with the same brand that I need my dogs. So far, my fussy cat hasn't had any issues with this food and has been eating it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cristie Shires

customer_reviews.title: I have always loved Blue for containing good ingredients and no glutens
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year old kitty has been on another variety of Blue Buffalo, however, he seems to be putting on a little weight. I switched him to this since it is lower in calories but still has the nutrients he needs. I have always loved Blue for containing good ingredients and no glutens. I was going to mix this food with his old food, but after letting him sniff it and him trying to dive into the bag, I decide to just switch cold turkey. He loves it! He's only been on it for a week, so I am not sure if he will lose a couple pounds, but I was happy to see that he enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: LazyGlutenFree

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient & a great meal for my kitties
customer_reviews.text: While it's not the cheapest price ALL the time, it's competitively priced and since I purchase with subscribe and save, we don't run out of catfood and it's extremely convenient to have it delivered - FREE with my prime perks.
customer_reviews.author: Robin W. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Made all of my cats barf everywhere and they didn't want anything to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped our sick kitty
customer_reviews.text: We were told my cat had a rare autoimmune disease and we would have to spend hundreds to take him to a specialty animal dermatologist. We wanted to try something natural first since we didn't have the money for the dermatologist. We were told to try grain free food, Omega 3, and essential oils. Well he got better and seems to be mostly back to normal. We feed this food and Omega 3 only. Definitely happy we tried this first!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Cecil

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this food...
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years, and I've used the "grain free" since Blue Buffalo came out with it. It's the only indoor, grain free, food that helps to keep my pudgy little kitties weight in check. It helped to slim them down when I first started feeding it, and no problems with them turning their noses up at it. I might also add that their coats have become healthier looking and shiny. The delivery was slow, but the price was good, so I didn't mind waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Lazy Bonz

customer_reviews.title: waste of money, made my cats deathly ill
customer_reviews.text: this food made some of my cats refuse to eat, and the rest threw up and had diarhea every where in the house. cost me hundreds of dollars in vet bills. it is poison to many cats. buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Cazbaz

customer_reviews.title: Weak Bowelled Cat?  Get this food!
customer_reviews.text: 3 Sphynx cats, 1 of which has horrible IBS issues... This food along with a light dose of steroids is the only solution we've found to the hershey squirts.
customer_reviews.author: K Conn

customer_reviews.title: Freedom
customer_reviews.text: My kitties love Blue Buffalo dry kitty food and Freedom (chicken indoor) is superb. This is a premium food that my kitties love. It is grain-free and for my kitties, that helps them keep carbs lower.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Reigers

customer_reviews.title: Bad bag?
customer_reviews.text: First bag from Chewy the cats loved. So ordered from amazon and for some reason cats won’t touch the kibbles in this bag. Really disappointed. Not sure if bad bag/batch or what but total waste.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Dough

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats with urine crystals
customer_reviews.text: This food is great for my picky cat with urine crystals. Wet food makes him puke and prescription dry food was expensive. The grain-free is important for cats with urine crystals and in combination with other changes I've made with his litter he hasn't had a flare up since I've switched to this food!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Easy on kitty's tummy
customer_reviews.text: This is the first food that my adult kitty doesn't automatically vomit. She has been eating it for about 3 weeks now. She loves it and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: ajnewengland

customer_reviews.title: The Best For a Healthy Life
customer_reviews.text: The best!!! (As well as the canned food!) We've had cats for 40 some years. Cats in our early years were fed popular brands containing dyes, grains, and other ingredients that I now know are unhealthy. The cats became very unhealthy the last half of their lives - miserable with diabetes, weight issues and eye problems. Since we have learned of Blue Buffalo Freedom cat food, our elderly cat was very healthy in her later years - 18 1/2 years she lived! Now our new cat is also experiencing the healthy life of Blue Buffalo Freedom Adult Indoor Cat Chicken. I wonder how long she will live?
customer_reviews.author: Steve Pike

customer_reviews.title: Ask the expert
customer_reviews.text: I took in my grandson's cat and the cat came with Freedom cat food. He scarfs it down every time and if he's happy than so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: All dust
customer_reviews.text: Received this and got it opened to feed our cats and there is a ton of dust in it like it was the bottom of the can. Have to strain it. :(
customer_reviews.author: chilieman

customer_reviews.title: Poppy’s favorite
customer_reviews.text: My cat won’t eat anything else, I’ve tried cheaper brands and she refused it!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Parks

customer_reviews.title: Love Blue Buffalo
customer_reviews.text: We have an overweight chihuahua. So we switched her food and after one month, we already see a difference in her energy and weight is starting to drop.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Parker

customer_reviews.title: Helped with cat's skin
customer_reviews.text: My cat had been having skin issues with a lot of scratching and itching. It came to the point it was hard to touch her because she was so sensitive. The vet suggested switching her to grain free food and her skin has become a lot better over the past few months.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly P

customer_reviews.title: Wow, my cats love Blue Buffalo!
customer_reviews.text: I give my cats canned cat food twice a day. They split a 3 ounce can each time. My two cats usually will take wet, canned cat food over ANY dry food. This Blue Buffalo food is different! They both liked it very much and are very happy to eat it any time. This has never happened before. I am impressed! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha R.

customer_reviews.title: Cats Are Carnivores!
customer_reviews.text: I feed our "yard cats" the cheap generic stuff, but as former owner of a gorgeous Bengal with severe digestive issues, I now choose to feed my new little Siamese (rescue) on grain-free, and she is doing beautifully on this, with a shiny coat, bright eyes, and lots of energy for her daily athletics.
customer_reviews.author: VHH

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this food and it has been the only dry ...
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food and it has been the only dry food that they will eat without getting sick. The item ships fast and I have never had any issues with the orders. I like to order this online because I find it more convenient and at a cost savings to the stores around me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: No bad smelling cat poops. None!! This is for the adult food. The blue buffalo kitty food makes it very stinky!! I switched her early with no problems..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kitty loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty Tinkerbella loves this food! It’s supposed to be great for indoor cats and being grain free helps her maintain her weight, it was recommended by my b/f’s sister who feeds her two cats the same thing!
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerbell32

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent food for my cat, he loves it! Quick delivery, well packaged, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: O.M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Blue Buffalo - love the product
customer_reviews.text: Our cat went from being unable to eat her Vet approved food and sick all the time to eating healthy, having lots of energy, and loving her food. Thank you Blue Buffalo - love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: My two cats love it, and so do I!
customer_reviews.text: Have been very pleased with this blue wilderness dry cat food. I have one cat with significant skin allergies, another with salmon. I've noticed both issues are better with grain free food. They both seem to really like the food, consistently jump up to the bowl when I'm scooping some fresh food out of bin. I plan to continue to purchase the same brand, good value considering the high-quality.
customer_reviews.author: MVSSantaFE

customer_reviews.title: Blue Baffalo Freedom Grain Free Adult Indoor Dry & Wet
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding my cats, who are 8 years old, this food for 7 years. It is the only food that the one cat can tolerate. I give them the dry food and they get about a tablespoon of the wet in the morning as their treat. I have tried other high end cat foods and my Ocicat cat cannot digest them. Both my cats stay at an average weight of 10-11lbs. I have never had any problems. I would recommend this food. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Fine cat food
customer_reviews.text: A bag lasts 3 months for a healthy adult male cat. My cat has been eating Blue Buffalo for years and has maintained good health because of it. I totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dan S

customer_reviews.title: Two paws up
customer_reviews.text: My oldest cat has food allergies, so I have tried many different brands of dry food before I found one that doesn't make her itchy. Both of my kitties love this dry food. I have to control their portions, otherwise they gobble this food up so fast they make themselves sick.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: my cat will not touch this
customer_reviews.text: O mixed some of my cats old food with this but she will not go near it. She has not eaten anything now for three days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't like my cats like grain free
customer_reviews.text: As for other brands that are compared to this..grain free.. My cats seems to eat less . I have one cat who is very picky and he seemed to throw up more. Going to try a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats was having skin problems, diarrhea, nausea, and vomiting. Since I switched foods (after getting him checked out by our vet!) he has not had any issues. Both of our cats love this food, and it has been really wonderful to have it delivered to our front door, not many stores out by us carry this brand. Amazon has been a real life saver. As a side note, if your pet is having issues always take them to their vet to get checked out before you make radical changes.
customer_reviews.author: GERTZ

customer_reviews.title: great food, delivered quickly
customer_reviews.text: this is good, high quality food for our cat, and it comes right to our door within a couple days of my order. cant beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t upset my cat’s system
customer_reviews.text: The only food my cat likes that doesn’t upset his tummy
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne G.

customer_reviews.title: Expired bags every order
customer_reviews.text: This bag of food and the last one were both past the best but date printed on them. I get the grain free one. I'm very disappointed and will be canceling my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: dfeliciaann

customer_reviews.title: Love blue buffalo cat food and so do our cats!
customer_reviews.text: Love blue buffalo cat food and so do our cats. We noticed a difference in our cat's hair texture and the amount of hair balls she had. We've had to put her on a special diet food recently and the amount of hair balls has drastically increased. We still buy this for our other cat and he doesn't have any issues. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this cat food!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat has been on BLUE Freedom from the time he was a kitten. He loves the food and we love the quality of ingredients. It is worth every penny! Also is nice to order online and have it delivered to the front door!
customer_reviews.author: T. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: All 8 cats eat it, must be good
customer_reviews.text: I thank you for the $22.40 price. $34 for 11lb bag wasn't cheap for 8 cats.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: BEST NUTRITION AND GREAT COAT
customer_reviews.text: Best Cat Food without Grains Best Nutrition plus a greatest hair coat❣
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Bollero

customer_reviews.title: Success! Loved by multi-cat household, woth the price to have the quality!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price to have great quality grain free food. We have a multi-cat household. One cat has storage mite allergies, and has reacted to foods containing grains. Every cat in the house loves this brand. Success!
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Our cats love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Our three cats love this food. I was skeptical at first as I've bought so many different bags of food that they don't eat. Or, they eat it once or twice and then avoid. I try to offer our cats a variety....and this one is a sure thing!! The food bowl is always empty and ready for a refill.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Stein Designs

customer_reviews.title: less than bite size
customer_reviews.text: at least one of my cats throws up every time he eats because the pieces are so small they don't feel the need to chew their food. cat and kitten food pieces are the same size, which seems like a design flaw
customer_reviews.author: D.Ramz

customer_reviews.title: Our cats are very picky-if they don't like the food
customer_reviews.text: Our cats are very picky-if they don't like the food, they refuse to eat and really complain. They really like this and have no problems with it, other than eating it too fast at times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Cat's hated it.
customer_reviews.text: My Cat's Didn't touch this at all!!! I mixed it with their old food and they still wouldn't eat. So I went back to their old food. TASTE OF THE WILD!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Desmonie

customer_reviews.title: Helps my kitty Stanley who has a sensitive digestive system ...
customer_reviews.text: Helps my kitty Stanley who has a sensitive digestive system to stay regular. He loves the taste obviously as he is very vocal and demanding at meal time :-)
customer_reviews.author: Tonya S

customer_reviews.title: Good cat food
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes this food and feels good knowing that he is eating healthy
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: After too many spit ups and chronic constipation in our cat, we took a friend's repeated recommendation and went for this product. Grainfree and apparently super tasty. Kitty gobbled it up. No transtioning necessary. Only a very rare spit up, no more constipation, and her coat has become silky shiny!
customer_reviews.author: McLean-ite

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat food + It'll make your cat feel like a chinchilla.
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this cat food in our four cat household for three years now. Prior to using it, one of our cats was constantly sick and our vet recommended that we try a grain free. After doing some review we decided to try this. Within a week all of our cats were so much softer and more energetic. Our sick cat hasn't been sick since.
customer_reviews.author: R. McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Positive changes in cats health
customer_reviews.text: Our cats stopped their EXCESSIVE shedding when we switched to this brand. One cat had fur like horse hair, now getting soft. Previous brands used weee Ian’s then Science Diet. Something must have been missing from their diet until now.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Cat

customer_reviews.title: Good healthy nutrition that my cats love
customer_reviews.text: My cats love Blue Buffalo and its much healthier than the other dry food that is out there. I have one particular cat that only eats this, and she is very healthy and her fur is very lustrous. I am very happy with this product and would highly recommend it to others!
customer_reviews.author: miribn

customer_reviews.title: Cats never meow 'no'!
customer_reviews.text: My cats like this very much. The morsel size is perfect and they never leave any leftovers. I appreciate the ingredients and the quality is apparent.
customer_reviews.author: dralexy

customer_reviews.title: BLUE Freedom Adult Indoor Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant on purchase because of how finicky cats are and there being different sizes of kibbles in the food. However, the cats readily eat it and it is a high-quality pet food. Nice sized bag. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLongTimeCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes flavor; Doesn't stink
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this flavor of Blue Buffalo Freedom Grain Free
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: My cats hate it
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it's a great product but my cats weren't a fan 1 of them threw it up every single time. She lost 2 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: cash

customer_reviews.title: Both my cats seem to really like this. Their coats look nice and have a ...
customer_reviews.text: Both my cats seem to really like this. Their coats look nice and have a better shine, plus it feels thicker. Their digestion of this seems to agree with them also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the vet recommended it when her fur got more dull and flaky ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had my kitty on Freedom grain-free for over a year now; the vet recommended it when her fur got more dull and flaky in winter. It seems to have made a difference - my Boo has been very shiny and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Kate K

customer_reviews.title: Great food & reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: My cats seem to be doing great on this food. We have one cat that has a grain allergy. I don't particularly like my cats to eat too much fish (mercury), so this food is perfect. They love the flavor and eagerly wolf it down each time. We use this as our dry food and Wellness Chicken canned cat food. This combo has served us well!
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Feisty Cats
customer_reviews.text: Two Siamese can't be wrong. They love it and appear very healthy. Low vomit-factor, doesn't constipate (that I can tell) and the price is really right compared to the vet's Rx kibbles. Blue & Sofie are as feisty as ever!
customer_reviews.author: Micha Hill

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: It has a good smell and lasts long. My cats love it
customer_reviews.author: Jhazmin

customer_reviews.title: BAD for kidney & bladder issues! 2 head VETERINARIANS had their cats on this and ALL HAD to be hospitalized.
customer_reviews.text: Says it's healthy and organic. It isn't. False advertising. VET took my cat off this after a crisis. 2 head vets had both of their cats on this and both of their cats had massive bladder and kidney issues with this. All the vets at my practice do not recommend feeding this to your cat. Google the huge number of lawsuits on this product. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Blue Buffalo Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a big indoor tortie who started putting on weight when she hit two years old and stopped running around like a crazy thing (all tortie owners know what I mean). She didn't like any of the other 'light' cat foods, but this one she absolutely adores; she can munch all day and her weight is normal. Her coat looks fantastic, too. She was raised on Blue Buffalo kitten food and is a strong, healthy cat. I'm now raising small kittens and they all love their Blue Buffalo food the most. Worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: alcuin9

customer_reviews.title: Cats LOVE it.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food. They actually found the freshly delivered amazon box and tore it open to get the the food. So not only is it a wholesome, healthy option for your cat, but it's apparently really delicious. I will buy again, most definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Haylee M

customer_reviews.title: the price is great and similar to the price it costs on chewy
customer_reviews.text: Aside from my cat loving this food, the price is great and similar to the price it costs on chewy. Love that I can order it on amazon and get it super quick when I'm running low
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: winner
customer_reviews.text: I switched my cats from store brands to this and I'm so glad I did. One bag lasts me about 3 months for my two cats and I feed them about 1/2 each per day. I don't know what it tastes like, but they seem to love it and got mad at me when I tried to give them something else.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper at Petco.com by $10!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but Petco sells it for 31.38 on repeat delivery instead of $41.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Libramento

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and well liked food
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food. I like the smaller bag better for convenience, but the larger bag is a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Out Cat Can't Get Enough
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when you buy this cat food. Your cat will be yelling for more. Out cat loves this food and she looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: GCarguy

customer_reviews.title: my poor cat has many allergies yet Blue Buffalo Freedom cat ...
customer_reviews.text: my poor cat has many allergies yet Blue Buffalo Freedom cat food does not aggravate them. His coat is silky and shiny since we began feeding him Blue Buffalo and he has no more bumps on his skin from scratching! I'm sure it is such a relief to him.
customer_reviews.author: paula potter

product_meta.title: Blue Buffalo Freedom Grain Free Natural Indoor Adult Dry Cat Food, Chicken
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Chicken| Size:11 lbFor pet parents who want to feed their furry friend a diet without grains, there’s nothing better than BLUE Freedom. It’s free from the grains and glutens that can trigger allergic reactions in some cats. BLUE Freedom is holistically formulated to support the needs of indoor cats. It starts with the carefully balanced calories in our ingredients to help them maintain a healthy body weight. BLUE Freedom is a product of the Blue Buffalo company. Based in the United States, Blue Buffalo makes premium-quality pet foods featuring real meat, fruit and vegetables.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
For pet parents who want to feed their furry friend a diet without grains, there’s nothing better than BLUE Freedom. It’s free from the grains and glutens that can trigger allergic reactions in some cats. Made with the finest natural ingredients, BLUE Freedom features: Delicious, protein-rich, Deboned Chicken. Whole carrots, sweet potatoes, peas, blueberries and cranberries. NO chicken (or poultry) by-product meals, NO corn, wheat or soy and nothing artificial
feature_bullets: STARTS WITH REAL CHICKEN: A recipe with delicious, real chicken as the first ingredient, this dry cat food features the high-quality ingredients you can feel good about feeding your feline friend without the grains that contain gluten.

GRAIN FREE CAT FOOD: BLUE Freedom grain free indoor cat food is specially formulated to help meet the unique needs of indoor cats including natural fiber sources to promote healthy digestion and carefully balanced calories to help maintain healthy body weight.

WITH LIFESOURCE BITS: This formula contains BLUE’s exclusive LifeSource Bits – a precise blend of antioxidants, vitamins and minerals carefully selected by holistic veterinarians and animal nutritionists to support immune system health, life stage requirements, and a healthy oxidative balance.

NATURAL CAT FOOD: BLUE dry cat food is formulated for the health and well-being of your adult cat and features the finest natural ingredients enhanced with vitamins and minerals. It never contains chicken (or poultry) by-product meals, corn, wheat, soy, artificial flavors or preservatives.

NATURAL CAT FOOD: BLUE dry cat food is formulated for the health and well-being of your adult cat and features the finest natural ingredients enhanced with vitamins and minerals. It never contains chicken (or poultry) by-product meals, corn, wheat, soy, artificial flavors or preservatives.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
